title: Molecular level seasonality of dissolved organic matter in freshwater and its impact on drinking water treatment
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,1964-1981
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00142G, Paper

Anna Andersson, Leanne Powers, Mourad Harir, Michael Gonsior, Norbert Hertkorn, Philippe Schmitt-Kopplin, Henrik Kylin, Daniel Hellström, Ämma Pettersson, David Bastviken
Improved characterization of dissolved organic matter (DOM) in source waters used for drinking water treatment is necessary to optimize treatment processes and obtain high drinking water quality.
